document_data.mainbody:
urkan the Reaver was a "mercenary lord" who operated throughout the Sword Coast, and later the Eastern Heartlands, during the 14 century DR.
In Eleint of 1357 DR, Lurkan traveled from his home in West Faer√ªn, east toward the lands around the Sea of Fallen Stars. Rumors of his relocation stated that he intended to sell his services between the various city-states of Zhentil Keep, Mulmaster, Hillsfar and the Forest Nation of Cormyr, who were all involved in major conflicts at the time.
